title: Manage a Player's Social Media Account
description: A player's agent needs to draft and post a message to the player's social media accounts.

tasks.description: Draft a post based on the player's instructions (e.g., thanking the fans after a win).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes the text for the social media post.

tasks.description: Send the draft to the player for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets approval from the player.

tasks.description: Once approved, post the message to the player's Twitter and Instagram accounts.
